parameters.name: PLAYER_NAME
parameters.messageText: With a hard grip, he grabs my hand and I feel like he is really welcoming me, and not doing this as an obligation of some kind.

parameters.name: PLAYER_NAME
parameters.messageText: "I am PLAYER_NAME. How did you know I'm new around here?"

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: "Oh, well. I know everyone around here. And I think everyone knows me!"

parameters.name: Keisuke
parameters.messageText: "I am your designated tour guide. Maybe you should call me Keisuke-senpai haha"

parameters.button0Text: "Oh, we'll see about that. So, where should we start?"
parameters.button1Text: "Okay, Keisuke-senpai. What will you show me first?"
